articles.title: NASA delays Mars helicopter flight to at least April 14th - Yahoo News Australia
articles.description: NASA has delayed the first flight of its Mars helicopter to at least April 14 after an issue during a test.
articles.content: You'll have to wait a little while longer to see NASA's Mars helicopter in action. The agency has delayed Ingenuity's first flight to "no earlier than" April 14th after a test on April 9th went awry.… [+809 chars]

articles.author: Analysis by Ben Westcott, CNN
articles.title: Australia's Sex Discrimination Act will soon apply to politicians. Why didn't it before? - CNN
articles.description: A series of legal loopholes that prevent Australia's public servants -- including politicians and judges -- from being prosecuted for sexual harassment look like they are finally about to be closed following nearly 40 years on the statute books.
